officialTitle: Volume Kinetics for Hyperoncotic Albumin in Burn Patients as Well as for Healthy Subjects
inclusionCriteria:
* For healthy individuals: Healthy, without allergies and with the age of 18 years or above.
* For patients: Burn injury exceeding 6-8 Total Burned Surface Area %
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Heart failure
* Signs of kidney injury/failure
* Severe allergies
